summary: An edited Kountervibe ENB Northern Lights and enhancements.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=6]Kustom ENB[/size][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/rJBY7GO.jpg[/img]
[center]Based on the popular Kountervibe ENB Northern Lights, I've tailored the visuals to appeal to me personally and thought I might
share it.[/center]
Features include:
[list][*]An edited Kountervibe ENB preset and SweetFX. Tailored to work with CoT, RLO and ELFX[/*]
[/list][list][*]Project ENB Sunsprite files. To replace the lens flare effects, which wasn't to my tastes.[/*]
[/list][list][*]Sky textures and meshes featured in Kountervibe ENBs' optional files.[/*]
[/list][list][*]Atmosphere.nif from Jawz, designed to help sky and horizon rendering issues with ENB. More info [url=http://enbdev.com/enbseries/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1930&p=57538&sid=40a110d0b14c8dd4daf7aa65e7990ff8&sid=40a110d0b14c8dd4daf7aa65e7990ff8#p57538]here[/url][/*]
[/list][list][*]d3d9.dll and ENBhost.exe from the latest ENB at this time v0265. Can replace this with future versions I believe.[/*]
[/list]
You can see a preview of itÂ [url=http://imgur.com/a/CGCIi]Here[/url] with ENB settings explained to get the effects achieved.

Installation Instructions:
For those who have trouble with getting ENBs to work.
[list=1][*]Get a program that opens .ZIP files like WinRAR[/*]
[*]Extract all the files into your Skyrim folder (usually located in Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim)
[/*]
[*]Done
[/*]
[/list]
DISCLAIMER:
This is simply a compilation, I have done none of the work apart from putting these wonderful mods together. All credit goes to the creators who work hard for no personal gain other than a better gaming experience.

Credits:
Boris Vorontsov - ENB Series
Gargorias - Revamped Exterior Fog
FXAA Injector - www.3dcenter.org
CeeJay.dk - SweetFX Shader Suite
Kyokushinoyama - Kountervibe ENB Nothernlights.
--JawZ-- - Sky mesh for ENBSeries v0.262 and newer.
author: Gawain
